drupalNodeEvent.title: Book Talk: One Belt One Road – Chinese Power Meets the World

field_speakers.processed: Eyck Freymann (University of Oslo), Ozge Soylemez (King's College London)

field_description.processed: The Belt and Road Initiative (BRI) is one of China’s most discussed foreign policy initiatives. What is the BRI? How does it influence other countries? In this webinar, Eyck Freymann will give a presentation of his new book on the topic and answer questions from the audience, in discussion with Özge Söylemez.
